memberdef.name: sbRECEIVE_COMPLETED
memberdef.initializer: vTaskSuspendAll(); \ { \ if( ( pxStreamBuffer )->xTaskWaitingToSend != NULL ) \ { \ ( void ) xTaskNotify( ( pxStreamBuffer )->xTaskWaitingToSend, \ ( uint32_t ) 0, \ eNoAction ); \ ( pxStreamBuffer )->xTaskWaitingToSend = NULL; \ } \ } \ ( void ) xTaskResumeAll();

memberdef.name: sbRECEIVE_COMPLETED_FROM_ISR

memberdef.name: sbSEND_COMPLETED
